title: Creating a Unified Perspective of Life on Earth
itunes:title: Creating a Unified Perspective of Life on Earth
description:
Saleem H. Ali, Distinguished Professor of Energy and the Environment at the University of Delaware discusses his new book "Earthly Order: How Natural Laws Define Human Life."

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
